This example demonstrates how the Form collection retrieves the values from a form.
这个例子讲告诉我们Form集合是如何通过表单获得特定值的.
A form collection in its simplest use.
Form集合最简单的使用方法.
Substance over form is an important principle in accounting.
实质重于形式(substanceover form)原则是会计核算中应遵守的重要原则.
Fully functional interface design that lets you re - run during the design Form interface!
完全实用的界面设计器,让你再运行时期设计Form界面!
This example demonstrates what the Form collection contains if several input fields have the same name.
这个例子讲告诉我们,如果一些input输入区的名称(name)相同,那么Form将包含的内容.
